text: Tamara Ecclestone Rutland (born 28 June 1984) is a British model, socialite, television personality, and the daughter of Bernie Ecclestone, the former chief executive of the Formula One Group, and Croatian model Slavica Ecclestone. ==Early life== Ecclestone was born in Milan, the second daughter of Bernie Ecclestone, the former chief executive of the Formula One Group, and model Slavica Radić. She is the sister of Petra Ecclestone. She was educated at Francis Holland School in London. She speaks English, Croatian and Italian. ==Career== Ecclestone was the presenter of Sky Sports Italia's coverage of the 2009 Formula 1 season. She has also been involved in a range of other lifestyle and glamour productions after making her television debut in 2006 presenting the Red Bull Air Race World Championship for Channel 4. In 2011, she starred in her own reality television show Tamara Ecclestone: Billion $$$ Girl on Channel 5. Ecclestone posed nude for Playboy in May 2013. Tamara's World premiered in October 2017 on ITVBe. ==Personal life== Ecclestone was engaged to Jonathan Ketterman in 2002. In 2013, Ketterman was found guilty of attempting to blackmail her.https://www.independent.co.uk/news/uk/crime/tamara-ecclestones-ex- boyfriend-derek-rose-jailed-for-four-years-for-200000-blackmail-8511276.html Ecclestone married Jay Rutland in June 2013. They have two daughters. The family resides in a house in Kensington Palace Gardens in London that was purchased for £45 million in 2011. On 13 December 2019, Ecclestone's house was burgled and jewellery with a reported total value of £50 million stolen, despite 24-hour security patrols and extensive surveillance measures. In January 2020, one of the house's cleaners and her son were arrested in possession of some of the jewels at Heathrow Airport and subsequently charged with conspiracy to commit burglary. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1984 births Category:British people of Serbian descent Category:People educated at Francis Holland School Category:Living people Category:English socialites Category:People from Bungay Category:English television personalities Category:People from Milan Tamara
title: Tamara Ecclestone
